-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | '$' in reverse.
--   
--   A Simple package that exports <a>==&gt;</a>, which operates in the
--   opposite direction of <a>$</a>.
@package rallod
@version 0.0.1

module Rallod
(==>) :: a -> (a -> b) -> b
